name: Low energy
description:
Welcome to Low Energy!

Spit your way home before you run out of power.

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 39

CONTROLS:

A/Left Arrow - Move left

D/Right Arrow - Move right

W/Up Arrow - Jetpack

Space - Spit!

Made for 1200x900

LDJAM Entry:  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/low-energy
